name: Cyber Hunt
description:
CYBER HUNT

Cyber Hunt is a third-person single-player game with two characters in one, whose task is to protect their firewall from dangerous bugs.

For each enemy, both characters and their abilities are needed to destroy it at all. Both characters must know the strengths and weaknesses of the enemies to erase them from the system forever.

Anna is pink and uses only a ranged weapon with lots of ammo and fast reload speed. Her weapon is useless on one enemy, but all the more powerful on another. Use her ability wisely to support Dave in close combat.

Dave is blue and uses only his sword. He can attack any opponent, but without Anna will not be able to stand against the masses.

Have Fun with my Second Project @_@
